title: Stjepan Mestrovic
content:
Mestrovic is Professor of Sociology at Texas A&M University. He was a consultant and expert witness for the... <!--more--> International Court of the Tribunal for Yugoslavia.
He provides similar services for US soldiers involved in court-martials and clemency hearings. His books include “The Good Soldier on Trial: A Sociological Study of Misconduct by the US Military Pertaining to Operation Iron Triangle, Iraq.
” It deals with the conviction of Pfc.
Corey Clagett for killing two unarmed Iraqis and trying to kill a third.
Mestrovic testified on his behalf at his clemency hearing.
Major world and national issues will be discussed.
